Plot SSD predictions with confidence intervals

Source: R/functions-plots.R
plot_predictions.Rd

Plot SSD predictions with confidence intervals

plot_predictions(
  x,
  pred,
  conc,
  label,
  colour,
  shape,
  percent,
  label_adjust,
  xaxis,
  yaxis,
  title,
  xmin,
  xmax,
  palette,
  legend_colour,
  legend_shape,
  xbreaks = NULL,
  trans,
  text_size,
  label_size,
  conc_value,
  big.mark,
  decimal.mark,
  ci = FALSE,
  ribbon = TRUE
)

Arguments

x

A fitdists object from ssd_fit_bcanz()

pred

Prediction data frame from predict()

conc

Character string column name for concentration values

label

Character string column name for point labels

colour

Character string column name for point colors

shape

Character string column name for point shapes

percent

Numeric hazard concentration percent to display (0-100 scale)

label_adjust

Numeric horizontal adjustment for point labels

xaxis

Character string x-axis label

yaxis

Character string y-axis label

title

Character string plot title

xmin

Numeric minimum x-axis limit (use NA for auto)

xmax

Numeric maximum x-axis limit (use NA for auto)

palette

Character string ggplot2 color palette name

legend_colour

Character string legend title for color aesthetic

legend_shape

Character string legend title for shape aesthetic

xbreaks

Optional numeric vector of x-axis break points (default: NULL)

trans

Character string axis transformation (e.g., "log10")

text_size

Numeric text size for plot elements

label_size

Numeric size for point labels

conc_value

Numeric concentration value for threshold line

big.mark

Character used as thousands separator

decimal.mark

Character used as decimal separator

ci

Logical whether to display confidence intervals (default: FALSE)

ribbon

Logical whether to display CI as ribbon vs lines (default: TRUE)

Value

ggplot2 object with SSD prediction plot
